description: Be ready for any cold weather Mother Nature throws your way with the Men’s Solaris Jacket. Lightweight, breathable, and wind-resistant PrimaLoft® Silver Hi-Loft insulation offers compressible warmth. Its 2-layer GORE-TEX® fabric, PFC-free Durable Water-Repellent finish, and 100% seam taping combine to repel water and prevent leaks from reaching your inner layers. Pull on the fixed hood for extra coverage, and customize your fit with the adjustable drawcord hem. This winter jacket features dual chest pockets that provide airflow while doubling as storage.
name: Marmot Solaris Jacket - Mens
